column4: if not called with the --force option, halt simply invokes shutdown. init 0 doesn't necessarily *have* to halt the system; it just runs the scripts that are assigned to runlevel 0.
shutdown is basically a wrapper around init 0 that adds nice things like time delays, reboot, login disabling, etc
